Content: ---------------PuRe---------------NLWelcome to PuRe! We are a friendly clan where you can meet new friends_ or find new enemies.NLNLAbout Us:NLWe are a small  clan hoping to grow. We have a Legends Team_ Pro Team_ and a Casual Team. We want to be able to pull out the best of your potential and become better but also be able to communicate with new people!NLNLContent Creators:NLWe are looking for content creators for YouTube_ and Twitch to help us grow through social media and for them to make montages for the team members etc!NL—————————————————-NLGFX Designers:NLLooking for GFX Designers to create logos_ banners_ templates for the clan and team members!NL—————————————————NLTry-out staff:NLWe are looking for active people that are able to recruit and try other people out!NL—————————————————NLSome things you should keep in mind:NLYou must have a mic_NLDon't be toxic_NLDo not disrespect anyone in the clan.NLNLHave Fun! :)NLNL============================NLYou will be going through tryouts to see what team you qualify for.NLNL------------------------------------------------------NL--The legends--NL13+ of age_NL300+ wins_NLGreat Builder_NLMust have a mic_NLGood call outs_NLHelp with tryouts (optional)NLNL------------------------------------------------------NL--Pro Team--NL125+ wins_NLGood builder_NLMust have a mic_NLDecent call outs.NLNL------------------------------------------------------NL--Casual Team--NL60+ Wins_NL0.75kd_NLMust have a mic.NLNL------------------------------------------------------NLNLIf you would like to join_ send me a DM to be invited!
